About Simple Calculator

This app was made as a part of Free Code Camp full-stack developer curriculum. This is a completely free self-paced course aimed at any audience from novice to experienced. Please consider contributing and checking it out at www.freecodecamp.com.
You can check my profile at freecodecamp.com/sabahang

Learning points for this project:

  • Grunt and Bower (Plugins used: watch, live-reload, uglify, cssmin, concat, less, jshint and connect
  • CSS3 Transformations
  • Css box-shadow
  • HTML entities
  • Modifying Bootstrap using less file and compiling it
Technologies used: HTML5, Bootstrap, CSS3, Jquery, Javascript
